 1997-00081997-01-070FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of the following persons as directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective March 1, 1997. (JUDITH MAXWELL, Ottawa, Ontario; BARBARA F. STEVENSON, Q.C., Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island; and JAMES SIMPSON PALMER, Calgary, Alberta)
Attachments
